archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1058
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Payments specialist, I want the ability for customer care reps to be able to easily search for suspense payments and notify AR/Payments to allocate once identified

properties.value: Can you briefly describe whole process for payments? When front end receives a call from customer. They can search but not apply the reallocation. then registeres task to reallocate to the payment sepcialst.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
